thread.title: Rimi Sen: Took up 'Bigg Boss 9' to reconnect with fans
thread.title_full: Rimi Sen: Took up 'Bigg Boss 9' to reconnect with fans - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Rimi Sen: Took up 'Bigg Boss 9' to reconnect with fans
text:
'Dhoom' girl Rimi Sen is venturing into film direction next year and the actress says she is using the ' Bigg Boss Nau' platform to connect with her fans again.*Rimi Sen*
The 34-year-old Bengali beauty, who was last seen in Tigmanshu Dhulia's 'Shagird' in 2011, said she has not bid adieu to acting.
"I am venturing into ... Â»
